answers.answer: Diabetes is often associated with several other conditions, including issues with blood pressure, thyroid, kidneys & eyes.There's been good evidence that controlling our blood sugar levels helps us minimize and/or delay the onset of potential complications, so we do have some influence.It's a good idea to talk with your diabetes specialist (endocrinologist) about your particular risks, to get referrals to other specialists as needed, and to get routine screening & evaluation tests done.

question: Can Type 1 Diabetes cause other health problems?  If so what are they?
title: Can Diabetes Cause Other Health Problems?
